r.s: Wrapper for the Sodium cryptographic library
r.d: A simple, low-level PHP extension for libsodium.
r.n: - Methods were moved to functions in a \Sodium\ namespace. - PHP 7 is now fully supported. - crypto_aead_chacha20poly1305_decrypt() now returns FALSE instead of a PHP error if verification fails. - multi-part hashing was implemented (crypto_generichash_{init|update|final}) - sealed boxes have been implemented (crypto_seal)
